metadata.description: A curated collection of Claude Code plugins for Git workflows and developer productivity

plugins.name: worktree
plugins.description: Create Git worktrees for parallel development. Creates standardized worktree structure in adjacent directory for working on multiple features simultaneously.

plugins.name: git-commit-push
plugins.description: Interactive git workflow with approval gates for reviewing changes, generating conventional commit messages, and pushing to remote. Uses industry best practices for commit message formatting.
